item.title: The ‘flagship office’ is on the rise—and it uses the principles of the experience economy to coax employees back to their desks
item.description: These carefully redesigned built environments, compelling stories, and authentic experiences would in fact be well worth an admission fee.

item.title: FBI calls Sunday incident at Trump golf club an apparent assassination attempt
A.I. might actually help us find a greater sense of purpose at work
item.description: If A.I. replaces mundane tasks, that frees us up to build human connections and invest in personal growth. There’s still a risk, though.

item.title: It's a big week for central banks around the world, with a slew of rate moves on the table
item.description: The Federal Reserve's highly anticipated two-day meeting, which gets underway on Tuesday, is poised to take center stage.

item.title: Fed appears set to cut rates this week. That could help stocks. Or harm them.

item.title: India can achieve sustainable growth of up to 8% in the coming years, central bank chief says
item.description: India can achieve sustainable economic growth of up to 8% over the medium term, according to the country's central bank governor.

item.title: China just raised its retirement age. American workers should take notice.
